text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga salicifoliola is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Brazil.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga salicifoliola". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38228A10106887. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38228A10106887.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
